title: No Header or Footer
demo1: This content is loaded using the handlebars plugin. The modal also has no header or footer provided, which can be set with data-modal-title="Modal Title" and data-modal-buttons="Lable 1|dismiss;Label 2|callback;"
demo2: And here is a modal with the data-modal-title set.
demo3: And here is a modal with data-modal-animate set to true.
